N

name - Variable in class arena.BotInfo
Bot name - set only once when bot created
name - Variable in class bots.Drone
My name
name - Variable in class bots.RandBot
My name (set when getName() first called)
name - Variable in class bots.SentryBot
My name
NAME_FONT - Variable in class arena.BattleBotArena
Size of the bot names
nanoTimeCorrection - Variable in class arena.BattleBotArena
On some machines, System.nanoTime() returns incorrect results.
newRound() - Method in class bots.Bot
This method is called at the beginning of each round.
newRound() - Method in class bots.Drone
Pick a random starting direction
newRound() - Method in class bots.HumanBot
 
newRound() - Method in class bots.RandBot
Decide whether we are overheating this round or not
newRound() - Method in class bots.SentryBot
Reset the "warned" array
nextMessage - Variable in class bots.Drone
My next message or null if nothing to say
nextMessage - Variable in class bots.RandBot
Next message to send, or null if nothing to send.
nextMessage - Variable in class bots.SentryBot
Next message to send
NUM_BOTS - Static variable in class arena.BattleBotArena
Total number of Bots in round 1 (if you have fewer than this, the rest of the spots in the array will be filled with Drones, RandBots, and Sentries).
NUM_BULLETS - Static variable in class arena.BattleBotArena
Number of bullets on screen at once for each bot
NUM_FRAMES - Variable in class arena.BattleBotArena
Number of frames in the buffer for instant replay (limited by heap size)
numExceptions - Variable in class arena.BotInfo
How many exceptions thrown
numKills - Variable in class arena.BotInfo
Number of kills by this Bot this round
numMessages - Variable in class arena.BotInfo
Number of messages sent this round
